relations.head: IGF2BP3
relations.label: bind
relations.text: IGF2BP3 binds m6A, increasing Linc00662 stability.

relations.head: Linc00662
relations.label: recruit
relations.text: Linc00662 recruits GTF2B, activating ITGA1 transcription.

analysis:
Context:  
• Context name: "pancreatic cancer"  
• Context type: disease  

Nodes:  
1. METTL3 → type: protein, status: up (in pancreatic cancer)  
2. Linc00662 → type: Gene/RNA, status: up (in pancreatic cancer)  
3. IGF2BP3 → type: protein, status: none  
4. N6-methyladenosine (m6A) → type: Epitranscriptomic modification, status: none  
5. GTF2B → type: protein, status: none  
6. ITGA1 → type: protein, status: up (in pancreatic cancer)  
7. FAK → type: protein, status: none  
8. Erk → type: protein, status: none  
9. focal adhesion → type: biological process, status: none  
10. tumor growth → type: clinical phenotype, status: none  
11. metastasis → type: clinical phenotype, status: none  
12. pancreatic cancer → type: disease, status: none  

Regulatory Relationships (text form):  
1. METTL3 methylates m6A, increasing Linc00662.  
2. m6A is on Linc00662.  
3. IGF2BP3 binds m6A, increasing Linc00662 stability.  
4. Linc00662 recruits GTF2B, activating ITGA1 transcription.  
5. ITGA1 activates FAK.  
6. FAK activates Erk.  
7. Erk initiates focal adhesion formation.  
8. focal adhesion promotes tumor growth.  
9. focal adhesion promotes metastasis.  
10. Linc00662 promotes tumor growth.  
11. Linc00662 promotes metastasis.
